properties.entry: INSERT INTO PICTURE VALUES ( SEQ_PICTURE.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , 'N' , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO LICENSE_MANAGE VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SEQ_LMANAGER.NEXTVAL , SEQ_PICTURE.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO USER_TABLE VALUES ( SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , ? , 'N' , '2' , 'N' , NULL , ? )
INSERT INTO STORE_TABLE VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SEQ_USER.CURRVAL , SEQ_LMANAGER.CURRVAL , SEQ_STORE.NEXTVAL , SEQ_PICTURE.CURRVAL , 'N' , SYSDATE , ? , ? )
SELECT M.MENU_CODE , M.MENU_NAME , M.PRICE , M.MENU_EXP , M.SALES_YN , M.STORE_CODE , P.REVISED_NAME , P.ROUTE FROM MENU M JOIN PICTURE P ON (M.PICTURE_CODE = P.PICTURE_CODE)
